string.text: %c[d_orange][SYS WARN]:%c[default] No recipe with suitable signature found in database.
%c[d_green][SYS NOTIF]:%c[default] Transmutation succesful. Result: %c[d_orange]$result%c[default].
%c[d_red][SYS ERROR]:%c[default] Device is not high enough tier for this transmutation.
%c[d_red][SYS ERROR]:%c[default] Recipe like this is already installed on device.
%c[d_red][SYS ERROR]:%c[default] Transmutation condition is not met.
%c[d_green][SYS NOTIF]:%c[default] Recipe installed succesfully.
%c[d_green][SYS NOTIF]:%c[default] Scan succesful: \n
• %s \n
UNKNOWN
%c[d_orange][SYS WARN]:%c[default] No anomaly was found nearby, aborting.
Transmutation module
Device that is installed on detectors and used for artefact fusion.
%c[d_green]Transmutation module installed. \n\n
%c[d_red]Transmutation module not installed. \n\n
\n\nINSTALLED RECIPES:
Hides recipe I

A worn out looking chip, contains many notes regarding mutant hide interactions with the anomalies found in the zone. /nOn more careful and deeper inspection throughout the messy and unorganized notes, that these "recipes" have been written and collected by many stalkers, most of them being lucky and not so lucky interactions with the different mutant threats that roam around the zone when in proximity to elemental dangers.
Fire recipe I

A small sized chip, it's contents consist of vital properties and interactions of common Fire artefacts with the different enviromental changing risks found in the zone. /nThroughout all the scientific annotations you find a series of patterns that can potentially bring artefacts to their maximun capabilities and suffer transmutation when in contact with other materials through the exposure of high density fire particles.
Fire recipe II

A small sized chip, it contains information about the detection of inner fusion of Fire artefacts that can be amplified with an specific reaction causing transformation and mutation. /nThe scientific files and contents of this chip are more advanced and you lack the understanding of a lot of terms and keywords that are mentioned in the document, altho, the possible combinations and results of the artefacts experiments are easy to tell judging by the emphazis used on them.
Fire recipe III

A small sized chip, consists of various researches regarding the discovery of an inner dormant core, the process of activation as well as the positive and negative impact that the process has on the many different Fire artefacts. /nThe scientific documents of this chip speak of the many failed attemps at activating said cores and the many more consequences these experiments have brought when forcing an artefact to alter it's natural state. /nOn the good end of the experiments, it's mentioned how some of the positive properties of these man activated artefacts have bringed to the world outside of the zone. /nIt is also mentioned that certain artefacts have acquired extra properties that aren't tied to their element, but you don't seem to find any sign of how to cause this effects.
Electra recipe I

A small sized chip, it's contents consist of vital properties and interactions of low tier Electra artefacts with the different enviromental changing risks found in the zone. /nThroughout all the scientific annotations you find a series of patterns that can potentially bring artefacts to their maximun capabilities and suffer transmutation when in contact with other materials through the exposure of high density fire particles.
Electra recipe II

A small sized chip, it contains information about the detection of inner fusion of Electra artefacts that can be amplified with an specific reaction causing transformation and mutation. /nThe scientific files and contents of this chip are more advanced and you lack the understanding of a lot of terms and keywords that are mentioned in the document, altho, the possible combinations and results of the artefacts experiments are easy to tell judging by the emphazis used on them.
Electra recipe III

A small sized chip, consists of various researches regarding the discovery of an inner dormant core, the process of activation as well as the positive and negative impact that the process has on the many different Electra artefacts. /nThe scientific documents of this chip speak of the many failed attemps at activating said cores and the many more consequences these experiments have brought when forcing an artefact to alter it's natural state. /nOn the good end of the experiments, it's mentioned how some of the positive properties of these man activated artefacts have bringed to the world outside of the zone. /nIt is also mentioned that certain artefacts have acquired extra properties that aren't tied to their element, but you don't seem to find any sign of how to cause this effects.
Chemical recipe I

A small sized chip, it's contents consist of vital properties and interactions of low tier Chemical artefacts with the different enviromental changing risks found in the zone. /nThroughout all the scientific annotations you find a series of patterns that can potentially bring artefacts to their maximun capabilities and suffer transmutation when in contact with other materials through the exposure of high density fire particles.
Chemical recipe II

A small sized chip, it contains information about the detection of inner fusion of Chemical artefacts that can be amplified with an specific reaction causing transformation and mutation. /nThe scientific files and contents of this chip are more advanced and you lack the understanding of a lot of terms and keywords that are mentioned in the document, altho, the possible combinations and results of the artefacts experiments are easy to tell judging by the emphazis used on them.
Chemical recipe III

A small sized chip, consists of various researches regarding the discovery of an inner dormant core, the process of activation as well as the positive and negative impact that the process has on the many different Chemical artefacts. /nThe scientific documents of this chip speak of the many failed attemps at activating said cores and the many more consequences these experiments have brought when forcing an artefact to alter it's natural state. /nOn the good end of the experiments, it's mentioned how some of the positive properties of these man activated artefacts have bringed to the world outside of the zone. /nIt is also mentioned that certain artefacts have acquired extra properties that aren't tied to their element, but you don't seem to find any sign of how to cause this effects.
Gravi recipe I

A small sized chip, it's contents consist of vital properties and interactions of low tier Gravitational artefacts with the different enviromental changing risks found in the zone. /nThroughout all the scientific annotations you find a series of patterns that can potentially bring artefacts to their maximun capabilities and suffer transmutation when in contact with other materials through the exposure of high density fire particles.
Gravi recipe II

A small sized chip, it contains information about the detection of inner fusion of Gravitational artefacts that can be amplified with an specific reaction causing transformation and mutation. /nThe scientific files and contents of this chip are more advanced and you lack the understanding of a lot of terms and keywords that are mentioned in the document, altho, the possible combinations and results of the artefacts experiments are easy to tell judging by the emphazis used on them.
Gravi recipe III

A small sized chip, consists of various researches regarding the discovery of an inner dormant core, the process of activation as well as the positive and negative impact that the process has on the many different Gravitational artefacts. /nThe scientific documents of this chip speak of the many failed attemps at activating said cores and the many more consequences these experiments have brought when forcing an artefact to alter it's natural state. /nOn the good end of the experiments, it's mentioned how some of the positive properties of these man activated artefacts have bringed to the world outside of the zone. /nIt is also mentioned that certain artefacts have acquired extra properties that aren't tied to their element, but you don't seem to find any sign of how to cause this effects.
Mysterious Recipe
A mysterious chip, it's contents are unknown but it matches the size and looks of any other transmutator chip.

%c[d_orange]No recipes on installed on this transmutator module.
remove transmutator

%c[pda_white]Basic Fire Transmutation 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
Early scientific investigations on artefact properties, brought to light the possibility of forcing artefacts into reaching higher levels of efficiency while exposing them to a similar element to their natural states.
 
The exposure to high heat temperatures and pressure can potentially mutate artefacts into a much stronger, enhanced variation of it.
 
After many attemps and recalibrations, what we consider "low tier" artefacts are now easier to handle, with a very low change of catastrophic desaster.
 
%c[pda_blue]Potential Transmutations%c[ui_gray_1]
 
• Eye (Mama's Beads + Dog heart) 
• Fireball (Crystal + Flesh meat)

%c[pda_white]Advanced Fire Transmutation 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
Further artefact experimenting, lead to the possibility of fusing artefacts of similar properties to expand their capabilities.
 
The familiarity of said artefacts is important to be capable to reach a smooth fusion between them, using artefacts of different elements can result on a completely different one or the destruction of everything around it.
 
The infrastructure in the scientific laboratories are safe enough to be able to perform these experiements, but we recommend against any other enviroment for your own sake.
 
%c[pda_blue]Potential Transmutations%c[ui_gray_1]
 
• Flame (Eye + Bloodsucker heart + Dog heart) 
• Pin (Fireball + Lurker tail + Flesh meat)

%c[pda_white]Expert Fire Transmutation 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
The last scientific experiments lead ot the discovery of a dormant core found sinde the artefact's nucleus, this core upon activation emits huge amount of radiation, with the chance of destabilizing and destroying the artefact.
 
The process which we define as "Transmutation" is highly recommended to be performed on a safe carefully isolated enviroment, forcing this evolution on the artefacts is highly dangerous.
 
Some scientist confirm to have performed this procedure on enviroments with elements that are familiar to the artefact, this a theory yet to be confirmed.
 
%c[pda_blue]Potential Transmutations%c[ui_gray_1]
 
• Dragon's eye (Flame + Chimera heart + Bloodsucker heart + Dog heart) 
• Itcher (Pin + Psysucker hand + Lurker tail + Flesh meat) 
• Sun (Lamp + Pseudogiant hide + Chimera Hide + Boar Hide)

The many different tests by what you assume different stalkers have been grouped and slapped together in no particular order.
 
You're able to separate the important recipes from all the content between the notes.
 
%c[pda_blue]Potential Transmutations%c[ui_gray_1]
 
• Bloodsucker Skin (Transmutated) - (Bloodsucker Skin + Signet) 
• Boar Hide (Transmutated) - (Boar Hide + Crystal + Generator)

• Psysucker Skin (Transmutated) - (Psysucker Skin, Signet)

Artefact Transmutation

%c[pda_white]Transmutation user guide
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
The Artefact Transmutator a result of many experiments with artefacts, created to facilitate the alteration of their properties through exposure to particles of similar elements.
 
The technological advacements during the experimentation with artefact properties and internal structure allowed to create this compact protorype which can be attached to your regular artefact detectors.
 
%c[pda_blue]Functionality%c[ui_gray_1]
 
The transmutator device database can be updated to cover more transmutations with the recipes you acquire, it can be attached and removed to your detector for such reason.
 
• Scanning - analyzes and displays the artefacts an anomaly can potentially create. 
• Transmutating - allows your detector to emit a pulse of particles that activates the artefacts internal properties, to mutate and enhance it's capabilities.
 
Keep in mind that these functionalities depend on the artefacts discovered and the detector's capabilities. 
In most cases for a succesful transmutation you need to first scan an anomaly, then the list of artefacts will be displayed, those would be artefacts that you can transmute in that anomaly if you have the recipe. Some recipes are special and require different conditions.
